text: Abatong’a inyuma basangala, khukwikhala khwabu okho inyuma wo Omurumwa nende Nyasaye, ne okhupanila nende omwandu kwabu nende emioyo chiabu khunjila ya Nyasaye nibibasinya. Ne nibaboola mbu mulatsia muliyie nende mumubasu kuno tawe, boola; “Omulilo kwa Jahannam kuli nende obubafu obunji , bamanyangakhwo?’’
